long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension is a single purpose Smart Web Search new tab experience. Browse the web on your New Tab experience and our Smart Search will auto-track Packages if your search contains a valid tracking number.

Permissions we request:

New Tab:
This permission allows the extension to replace the page you see when opening a new tab

Privacy Policy: https://www.packagetracker.live/pages/privacy.html
EULA: https://www.packagetracker.live/pages/eula.html

Uninstall Instructions: 
https://www.packagetracker.live/pages/uninstall.html
